reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 425/04: IESO BOARD OF DIRECTORS
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 425/04: IESO BOARD OF DIRECTORS
reg_info.act_under: Electricity Act, 1998   Loi de 1998 sur l’électricité

content.content: 1. A person who has a material interest in a market participant is a member of a class who may not hold office as a director of the IESO.  O. Reg. 425/04, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. A person who has a material interest in a market participant is a member of a class who may not hold office as a director of the IESO.  O. Reg. 425/04, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 425/04, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 425/04, s. 2.
